entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump says #COVID19 is a worse attack than 9/11 AND Pearl Harbor and yet the presidents during those times never left the country feeling like they didn’t do every possible thing in their power to help and make things right. Trump can’t even be honest to a nurses face
